title: I just versed a triple Rageblade comp.
body:
Holy bloody hell

When is it gonna get _**f u c k i n g  n e r f e d**_

replies.body:
Yeah Olee get your frozen heart on your Ahri ;-)

hehehehehehehehehehe
Rageblade champs also take time to scale, you need to punish their dips in power early on.

Rageblade takes time to ramp up so if you poke them from afar or burst them out you should be fine.
If you're having an AA battle with them then yeah you're probably going to lose.

theres still a lot of options you can do yourself to help kite/disengage/work around it. not everyone can kite them as well as an anivia, but you still have things like randuins frozen heart, warding more, not giving up early kills. against atk spd champs you need to capitalise early otherwise they'll get stronger in the late game
I like it, don't think it needs nerfing.

they already nerfed it, so it wont. 
Side note if you REALLY need to counter it buy frozen heart
